summary.name: Pearl Lash...
summary.description: Is here to provide a series of in-depth training courses designed for licensed businesses as well as individuals who are looking to expand their areas of expertise and improve the quality of services you offer. Our training sessions are held on Mondays at our band new Tallahassee location. We also offer mobile training with convenient on-site courses designed to fit your business schedule and lifestyle for as few as 2 as as many as 20 students. Providing broader knowledge and resources in one of the hottest fields in the beauty industry while adapting to your schedule is what distinguishes Pearl Lash at one of the leaders in the industry.
